articles.title: Former 1B Keith Hernandez cherishes 'a great moment,' as New York Mets retire No. 17 jersey
articles.description: A rock-steady leader for the New York Mets' last championship team, former first baseman Keith Hernandez received a rare honor Saturday when the club retired his No. 17 jersey before a game against the Miami Marlins.

articles.title: Top pick Paolo Banchero powers Orlando Magic's wild win vs. Sacramento Kings in sudden death OT
articles.description: The Kings erased an 18-point deficit with less than five minutes to go and forced two overtimes before a layup off a pass from No. 1 pick Paolo Banchero gave Orlando the victory in sudden death.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- The Orlando Magic led by 18 points with less than five minutes left in regulation of their NBA Summer League against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday, well on their way to a victory.

articles.title: Portland Trail Blazers rookie Shaedon Sharpe out of Summer League with shoulder injury
articles.description: Shaedon Sharpe, the No. 7 pick in last month's draft, will miss the rest of the Blazers' Summer League slate with a small labral tear in his left shoulder.
articles.content:
LAS VEGAS -- Shaedon Sharpe's first Summer League with the Portland Trail Blazers is over.

articles.title: Chicago Sky's Allie Quigley wins WNBA 3-Point Contest for record fourth time
articles.description: Chicago Sky's Allie Quigley won the WNBA 3-Point Contest for a record fourth time Saturday, putting together a perfect final rack.
articles.content:
CHICAGO -- Allie Quigley won the WNBA 3-Point Contest for a record fourth time Saturday, putting together a perfect final rack.

articles.title: MasterCard pauses endorsement deals with LIV Tour golfers Ian Poulter and Graeme McDowell
articles.description: Ian Poulter and Graeme McDowell are the latest players on the LIV tour to have sponsors back away from them as MasterCard said it is pausing its endorsement deals with the two.
articles.content:
MasterCard has paused its endorsement deals with LIV golf tour members Ian Poulter and Graeme McDowell, the company told ESPN.

articles.title: Nashville Predators sign Filip Forsberg to 8-year extension
articles.description: Filip Forsberg avoids free agency by signing an eight-year extension with the Predators. Forsberg's new deal carries an average annual valur of $8.5 million, sources confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
The Nashville Predators have re-signed forward Filip Forsberg to an eight-year contract extension days before he was set to reach unrestricted free agency, the team announced on Saturday.

articles.title: Elena Rybakina beats Ons Jabeur to win women's championship at Wimbledon
articles.description: After dropping the first set, Elena Rybakina regained her footing with her big serve and powerful forehand to beat Ons Jabeur and win the Wimbledon women's singles championship.
articles.content:
LONDON -- Elena Rybakina beat Ons Jabeur 3-6, 6-2, 6-2 in the Wimbledon final on Saturday to become the first tennis player representing Kazakhstan to win a Grand Slam singles championship.
